attributes.action: Strip Sir Fred Goodwin of his Peerage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir Fred Goodwin has in the opinion of this proposer been unmasked as a fraud, having negotiated himself into a position, above his station and abilities, from where he has presided over one of the country's greatest banking collapse in history, the destruction of a British institution and a significant loss of wealth.   

Sir Fred should be immediately stripped of his title and the British government should pursue him personally for financial redress.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Honours Committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
